en-US.summary: Test how wise or unwise you are!
en-US.name: Dumb Quiz
en-US.description:
Test your general knowledge with work-a-day questions. Beware, they might be tricky sometimes!
To start, just say "Alexa, launch Dumb Quiz". You can stop the game anytime by saying "Alexa, stop".
